item.title: Open Redirects In State Parameters
item.description: Now that the deadline to fix this vulnerability has passed, I’ve decided to publish this blog post that covers a web vulnerability I’ve found in the login mechanism of a particular company. Everything started when I had a look at a more complex part of a public web application of this vendor. The web application that gives out a link to the user that can be used to open up the same user state again at a later point.
